name: The Guild Manager
description:
Mix and match your team of heroes and use them to take on an important mission  eliminating the tainted knights by completing series of turn based tactical battles!

'The Guild Manager' is what I named this small arcade-ish tactical turn based game, it is based on Project Wuxia which concept were written about two or three months ago after the workload in the studio that I was working with lessened.

I've been implementing this game for more than a month, my original plan was to  make a non polished but fun to play prototype, but the incoming game development event in my country made me put some bells and whistles on it at the cost of less features than what I had originally planned

This game is just a subset of project Wuxia, it's still not a full vertical slice of the game that I envisioned but this subset is the core system, the darling feature, that defines the game, so I hope you enjoy it and I am looking forward to hear your feedback!

Sorry for the large download size, I made this build in a rush and didn't have the time to trim down some unused assets

Special thanks to Dungeon Mason that made Mini Legion series in unreal market place, the best purchase I've ever done in the Epic stores!
